44.418 45.123 !
45.123 45.652 !

51.909 54.553
end at 54.553


x=lull in speech - weight should be light on those clips

(2.542 3.836)(3.836 6.070)(6.070 10.752)(10.752 12.338)(12.338 13.249)(13.249 14.071)(14.071 14.717)(14.717 16.833)(16.833 19.095)(19.095 21.063)(21.063 21.944)(21.944 24.529)(24.529 32.021)(32.021 33.754)(33.754 35.017)(35.017 38.337)(38.337 39.747)(39.747 41.803)(41.803 44.418)(44.418 45.123)(45.123 45.652)(45.652 46.592)(46.592 51.909)(51.909 54.553)
